title: Mandarava
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery
description: Cafe offering organic food, drinks, and baked goods with gluten free options. Each day a different selection of grains, beans, soup, and savory vegetable. Has juices and smoothies, French pressed coffee, handmade chocolate, spiced nuts, and granola. Ask about the Sunday Supper Club, a ticketed 3-course meal. Window seats and a long stone bar wrap around the open kitchen. Playground outside for kids.
